page.title: 20 PATTERDALE MOUNTAIN RESCUE
page.content: THERE IS A MOUNTAIN RESCUE CENTRE IN OUR AREA. THIS IS AN ORGANISATION RUN BY LOCAL PEOPLE WHICH CAN BE CALLED UPON IN THE EVENT OF A EMMERGENCY ON THE FELLS. THE ORGANISATION HAS TO FINANCE ITSELF BY VARIOUS FUND RAISING EFFORTS TO PURCHASE NEW EQUIPMENT. CURRENTLY THE CHILDREN AT THIS SCHOOL HAVE RECENTLY WRITTEN A BOOKLET ENTITLED 'OUR DALE' WHICH IS ON SALE TO TOURISTS AND LOCALS, WITH THE PROCEEDS BEING DONATED TO THIS ORGANISATION. THE TEAM HAS ITS OWN ELECTED LEADER AND THERE ARE ABOUT 20 MEMBERS WHO CAN BE CALLED UPON IF A RESCUE IS TO BE CARRIED OUT. THE TEAM HAS TWO LAND ROVER-AMBULANCES. THE MOST TREACHEROUS MOUNTAIN IN THE LAKE DISTRICT SEEMS TO BE HELVELLYN. THE TEAM HAS TO ATTEND ABOUT FIFTY RESCUES AND SEARCHES A YEAR.
